Message:
My mother was found
a few days later...
completely turned into a tree.

She stood on the summit of
the mountain that overlooked
our village, beautiful flowers
blossoming from her branches...

Smiles immediately vanished
from everyone’s faces,
and the village lost
the life it once had.

Seeing this, I knew I just
couldn’t let things go on
as they were.

Now’s not the time to
be moping around...
These tears won’t
get me anywhere...

With Mother gone,
I need to protect
our village...our family...!

My mind was swimming
with worry, and I was so scared,
my legs wouldn’t stop shaking.

But even so, I still managed
to raise my voice.

“Now that my mother’s soul has
returned to Heaven’s Ocean,

I will inherit her dying wish,
and I will break
the witch’s curse!”
